TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Pane

summary.span: 代表一个窗格。

span.span: Represents a window pane.

summary.span: Pane 对象是 Panes 集合的成员。

span.span: The Pane object is a member of the Panes collection.

summary.span: 集合包含单个窗口的所有窗口窗格。

span.span: The collection includes all the window panes for a single window.

para.span: 使用窗格(), 其中是索引号, 返回单个窗格对象。

span.span: Use Panes(), where is the index number, to return a single Pane object.

para.span: 下面的示例关闭活动窗格。

span.span: The following example closes the active pane.

para.span: 使用 Add 方法或 拆分 属性添加一个窗格。下面的示例拆分活动窗口的当前窗口大小的 20%。

span.span: Use the Add method or the Split property to add a window pane. The following example splits the active window at 20 percent of the current window size.

para.span: 以下示例将活动窗口一分为二。

span.span: The following example splits the active window in half.

para.span: 您可以使用 SplitSpecial 属性在一个单独的窗格中显示批注、 脚注或尾注。

span.span: You can use the SplitSpecial property to show comments, footnotes, or endnotes in a separate pane.

para.span: 当窗口被拆分或在非页面视图下显示脚注、批注等信息时，窗口具有多个窗格。以下示例在普通视图中显示批注窗格，然后提示关闭该窗格。

span.span: A window has more than one pane if the window is split or the view is not print layout view and information such as footnotes or comments are displayed. The following example displays the comments pane in normal view and then prompts to close the pane.

remarks.code: ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow.View.Type = wdNormalView If ActiveDocument.Comments.Count >= 1 Then ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow.View.SplitSpecial = wdPaneComments response = _ MsgBox("Do you want to close the comments pane?", vbYesNo) If response = vbYes Then _ ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow.ActivePane.Close End If

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Activate() runtime managed

summary.span: 激活指定的窗格。

span.span: Activates the specified pane.

para.span: 本示例拆分活动窗口，然后激活第一个窗格。

span.span: This example splits the active window and then activates the first pane.

example.code: Sub SplitWindow() With ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow .SplitVertical = 50 .Panes(1). Activate End WithEnd Sub

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

para.span: Visual Basic 的 CreateObject 和 GetObject 函数使您可以从 Visual Basic for Applications 项目中访问 OLE 自动化对象。

span.span: Visual Basic's CreateObject and GetObject functions give you access to an OLE Automation object from a Visual Basic for Applications project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AutoScroll([in]int32 Velocity) runtime managed

span.span: The speed for scrolling.

summary.span: 在指定的窗格中自动滚动。

span.span: Scrolls automatically through the specified pane.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BrowseToWindow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 仅供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BrowseWidth As Integer
public: property int BrowseWidth { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回在指定窗格中的文字换行的区域的宽度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns the width (in points) of the area in which text wraps in the specified pane.

summary.span: 只读的 长 。

span.span: Read-only Long.

para.span: 此属性仅用于 Web 版式视图。

span.span: This property works only when you are in Web layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() runtime managed

summary.span: 关闭指定的邮件合并数据源、窗格或任务。

span.span: Closes the specified Mail Merge data source, pane, or task.

para.span: 本示例在拆分活动窗口时关闭活动窗格。

span.span: This example closes the active pane if the active window is split.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

summary.span: 只读 Long。

span.span: Read-only Long.

para.span: 如果在 Microsoft Word 中创建对象， 创建者 属性返回的十六进制数是 4d535744，它表示字符串"MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the Creator property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: 此属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码中使用。

span.span: This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplayRulers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在指定窗格中显示标尺。

span.span: True if rulers are displayed for the specified pane.

summary.span: 读/写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

para.span: DisplayRulers 属性等效于在 视图菜单上的 标尺命令。

span.span: The DisplayRulers property is equivalent to the Ruler command on the View menu.

para.span: 如果 DisplayRulers 是 假 的水平和垂直标尺将不会显示，而不考虑 DisplayVerticalRuler 属性的状态。

span.span: If DisplayRulers is False, the horizontal and vertical rulers won't be displayed, regardless of the state of the DisplayVerticalRuler property.

para.span: 本示例将活动窗格切换到页面视图并显示水平和垂直标尺。

span.span: This example switches the active pane to print layout view and displays the horizontal and vertical rulers.

example.code: With ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow.ActivePane .View.Type = wdPrintView . DisplayRulers = True .DisplayVerticalRuler = TrueEnd With

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplayVerticalRuler { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在指定窗格中显示垂直标尺。

span.span: True if a vertical ruler is displayed for the specified pane.

summary.span: 读/写 boolean 类型的值 。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

para.span: 仅在页面视图中显示垂直标尺并且只有将 DisplayRulers 属性设置为 True 。

span.span: A vertical ruler appears only in print layout view, and only if the DisplayRulers property is set to True.

para.span: 本示例将活动窗格切换到页面视图并显示水平和垂直标尺。

span.span: This example switches the active pane to print layout view and displays the horizontal and vertical rulers.

example.code: With ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow.ActivePane .View.Type = wdPrintView .DisplayRulers = True . DisplayVerticalRuler = TrueEnd With

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Document As Document

summary.span: 返回与指定窗格相关联的对象。

span.span: Returns a object associated with the specified pane.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Frameset As Frameset

summary.span: 返回一个 object 类型的值, 该值代表整个框架页或框架页上的单个框架。

span.span: Returns a object that represents an entire frames page or a single frame on a frames page.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 有关创建框架页的详细信息, 请参阅。

span.span: For more information on creating frames pages, see .

para.span: 本示例紧邻指定框架的右侧添加一个新框架。

span.span: This example adds a new frame to the immediate right of the specified frame.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HorizontalPercentScrolled { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置文档宽度的百分比表示的水平滚动位置。

span.span: Returns or sets the horizontal scroll position as a percentage of the document width.

summary.span: 读/写 长 。

span.span: Read/write Long.

para.span: 以下示例将 Document1 窗口的活动窗格水平滚动至最左边。

span.span: This example horizontally scrolls the active pane of the window for Document1 all the way to the left.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 Long ，该值表示集合中项的位置。

span.span: Returns a Long that represents the position of an item in a collection.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public void LargeScroll (ref object Down, ref object Up, ref object ToRight, ref object ToLeft);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LargeScroll([in]object& Down, [in]object& Up, [in]object& ToRight, [in]object& ToLeft) runtime managed
Public Sub LargeScroll (Optional ByRef Down As Object, Optional ByRef Up As Object, Optional ByRef ToRight As Object, Optional ByRef ToLeft As Object)

span.span: The number of screens to scroll the window down.
The number of screens to scroll the window up.
The number of screens to scroll the window to the right.
The number of screens to scroll the window to the left.

summary.span: 将窗口或窗格滚动指定的屏数。

span.span: Scrolls a window or pane by the specified number of screens.

para.span: 此方法等效于在水平和垂直滚动条上单击滚动块以外的位置。

span.span: This method is equivalent to clicking just before or just after the scroll boxes on the horizontal and vertical scroll bars.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinimumFontSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在指定窗格中显示的最小字体大小 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the minimum font size (in points) displayed for the specified pane.

summary.span: 读/写 Long。

span.span: Read/write Long.

para.span: 此属性仅影响 Web 版式视图中显示的文本。

span.span: This property only affects the text as shown in Web layout view.

para.span: 显示在 "格式" 工具栏上并用于打印的磅大小不会发生变化。

span.span: The point sizes that are displayed on the Formatting toolbar and used for printing aren't changed.

para.span: 本示例将活动窗口设置为大纲视图，并将活动窗格中的最小字号设置为 12 磅。

span.span: This example sets the active window to online view and then sets the minimum font size for the active pane to 12 points.

example.code: With ActiveDocument.ActiveWindow .View.Type = wdWebView .ActivePane. MinimumFontSize = 12End With

para.span: 本示例返回活动窗格的最小字号。

span.span: This example returns the minimum font size for the active pane.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NewFrameset() runtime managed

summary.span: 基于指定的窗格新建一个框架页。

span.span: Creates a new frames page based on the specified pane.

para.span: 有关创建框架页的详细信息, 请参阅。

span.span: For more information on creating frames pages, see .

para.span: 本示例将打开一个名为"Temp.doc"的文件，然后创建一个新的框架页，该框架页中唯一的一个框架中包含"Temp.doc"。

span.span: This example opens a document named "Temp.doc" and then creates a new frames page whose only frame contains "Temp.doc".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Next As Pane
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Pane ^ Next { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Pane ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 Pane 对象，该对象代表集合中的下一个文档窗格。

span.span: Returns a Pane object that represents the next document pane in the collection.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Pages As Pages
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Pages ^ Pages { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Pages ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个集合, 该集合代表文档中的页面。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents the pages in a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PageScroll (ref object Down, ref object Up);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PageScroll([in]object& Down, [in]object& Up) runtime managed
Public Sub PageScroll (Optional ByRef Down As Object, Optional ByRef Up As Object)

span.span: The number of pages to be scrolled down.
The number of pages to be scrolled up.

summary.span: 使指定的窗格或窗口逐页滚动。

span.span: Scrolls through the specified pane or window page by page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 对象 ，表示指定的 窗格中 对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an Object that represents the parent object of the specified Pane object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Previous As Pane
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Pane ^ Previous { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Pane ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 Pane 对象，该对象代表集合中的上一个文档窗格。

span.span: Returns a Pane object that represents the previous document pane in the collection.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Selection As Selection

summary.span: 返回表示所选内容或插入点在文档窗格中的 选择 对象。

span.span: Returns the Selection object that represents a selection or the insertion point within a document pane.

summary.span: 只读的。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SmallScroll (ref object Down, ref object Up, ref object ToRight, ref object ToLeft);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SmallScroll([in]object& Down, [in]object& Up, [in]object& ToRight, [in]object& ToLeft) runtime managed
Public Sub SmallScroll (Optional ByRef Down As Object, Optional ByRef Up As Object, Optional ByRef ToRight As Object, Optional ByRef ToLeft As Object)

span.span: The number of lines to scroll the window down.
The number of lines to scroll the window up.
The number of lines to scroll the window to the right.
The number of lines to scroll the window to the left.

summary.span: 将窗口或窗格滚动指定的行数。

span.span: Scrolls a window or pane by the specified number of lines.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TOCInFrameset() runtime managed

summary.span: 基于指定文档创建一个目录，并将其放入框架页左边的新框架中。

span.span: Creates a table of contents based on the specified document and puts it in a new frame on the left side of the frames page.

para.span: 有关创建框架页的详细信息, 请参阅。

span.span: For more information on creating frames pages, see .

para.span: 本示例实现的功能是：打开一个名为“Proposal.doc”的文件，基于该文件创建一个框架页，并添加一个含有该文件目录的框架（位于页面的左侧）。

span.span: This example opens a file named "Proposal.doc", creates a frames page based on the file, and adds a frame (on the left side of the page) containing a table of contents for the file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int VerticalPercentScrolled { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置垂直滚动位置占文档长度的百分比。

span.span: Returns or sets the vertical scroll position as a percentage of the document length.

summary.span: 读/写 Long。

span.span: Read/write Long.

para.span: 以下示例将 Document1 窗口的活动窗格垂直滚动至结尾。

span.span: This example vertically scrolls the active pane of the window for Document1 to the end.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property View As View
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::View ^ View { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::View ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 View 对象，该对象表示指定窗格的视图。

span.span: Returns a View object that represents the view for the specified pane.

para.span: 本示例显示与 Windows 集合中的第一个窗口相关联的窗格的所有非打印字符。

span.span: This example shows all nonprinting characters for panes associated with the first window in the Windows collection.

example.code: For Each myPane In Windows(1).Panes myPane. View .ShowAll = TrueNext myPane

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Zooms As Zooms
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Zooms ^ Zooms { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Zooms ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个集合, 该集合代表每个视图 (如普通视图、大纲视图或页面视图) 的缩放选项。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents the magnification options for each view (such as normal view, outline view or print layout view).

para.span: 有关返回集合中单个成员的信息, 请参阅。

span.span: For information about returning a single member of a collection, see .

para.span: 本示例将在普通视图中打开的所有窗口的显示比例设为 100%。

span.span: This example sets the magnification in normal view to 100 percent for each open window.

example.code: Dim wndLoop as Window For Each wndLoop In Windows wndLoop.ActivePane. Zooms (wdNormalView).Percentage = 100Next wndLoop

para.span: 本示例设置页面视图的显示比例，使整个页面可见。

span.span: This example sets the magnification in print layout view so that an entire page is visible.
